name: Employment Brawl Royale
description:
University project, still in development. The theme for this unit is "Meaningful Games". If you download this game, please leave me some feedback in the comments below! A playthrough shall only take 5 minutes. Xbox Controllers required.

The players choose a character who are applying for a job and must battle each other as well as bots to become successfully employed.  One to Four players can play, and fight for the same job.

This game is meant to represent how getting a job can be difficult and competitive but with the right mind set, qualifications and soft skills, getting a job can be easier. But even without the correct qualifications and if you work hard enough or are skilled enough, you may still end up becoming employed, it is just much harder.

With the possibility of local multiplayer, a goal for the players to have discussion by the end of a play session and possibly share their own real experiences from when they have applied for employment in the past.

Here is a link to the Trello page showing the progress of the game an upcoming features.
